All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Account
Stores information about this client.
Client
This class handles the all the communication with the server, except the Lobby and Game, using a Socket and ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputStream.
ClientStart
This class is responsible for starting the client and creating the frame for the UI.
CommsFromServerThread
This class is used to create a permanent connection to the server with this client while they are logged in, in order to receive unprompted messages from the server such as friend requests from other users.
DicePanel
Stores an image for each six faces of a die in a JPanel.
The panel with all die faces invisible when created.
Game
The game window.
GameLogic
This class handles the actions performed in game by a client.
GamePage
Provides the UI for the game page.
LobbyLogic
This class handles the communication with the server for the Lobby and Game using a Socket and a Scanner as input and a PrintWriter as output.
LobbyPage
Provides the UI for the lobby page.
LoginLogic
This class handles the logic and actions performed by a client in the login page.
LoginPage
Provides the UI for the login page.
MainLogic
This class handles the logic and actions performed by a client in the the main page.
MainPage
Provides the UI for the main page.
MovementTest  
MyTable
A table in a JPanel where the user can select the people, places and weapons they suspect were involved in the crime.
Panel
This class represents the game board and handles the interactions the players have with it.
Player
This class represents a player and their character, position and amount of moves left in a game.
RegisterLogic
This class handles the logic and actions performed by a client in the register page.
RegisterPage
Provides the UI for the register page.
Suggestion
A suggestion or accusation phrase, using a dropdown menu to select the intended person and weapon to suggest, in a JPanel.
WatsonClue
A random clue shown in a JPanel.
